name: @ground/root
description: Root package for Ground hosted components

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && for p in lib web functions e2e-tests; do npm run clean --prefix $p; done
scripts.build: npm i && npm run build --prefix schema && npm run build --prefix functions && npm run build:$npm_config_variant --prefix web && npm run build --prefix e2e-tests
scripts.watch:local: npm run watch --prefix functions & npm run watch:local --prefix web
scripts.start:local: npx firebase emulators:exec 'npm run watch:local' --project ground-local-dev --ui --config firebase.local.json --import data/local
scripts.export:local: npx firebase emulators:export data/local --project ground-local-dev --only firestore
scripts.start-and-export:test: npx firebase emulators:exec 'npm run watch:local' --project ground-local-dev --ui --config firebase.local.json --import data/test --export-on-exit data/test
scripts.deploy: npm run build:$npm_config_variant --project=$npm_config_project && npm run login && firebase deploy --project $npm_config_project
